elements.title: NCX
elements.description: NCX provides a marketplace for forest carbon payments. Our carbon credits represent real, immediate, and cost-efficient change on the landscape.

elements.title: Sylvera
elements.description: Sylvera provides data on nature-based offset projects. This covers data such as the raw carbon performance, additionality, permanence, co-benefits, and risk.

elements.title: Planetly
elements.description: A simple and user-friendly software to enable intelligent carbon management for businesses.

elements.title: Carbon chain
elements.description: CarbonChain was born in 2019 with a mission to make supply chains green again. Our products offer quantitative and actionable solutions to reduce greenhouse gas emissions in the supply chains of the world’s most polluting industries — oil & gas, mining, metals, minerals and agriculture — responsible for 50% of global greenhouse gas emissions.

elements.title: Patch
elements.description: Patch mission is to reach giga-tonne scale carbon sequestration. Businesses need to focus on both rapidly decarbonizing their operations and compensating unavoidable emissions.

elements.title: Emitwise
elements.description: Emitwise wants to enable companies to become carbon neutral by helping businesses track the carbon footprint of their organisation, including scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions.

elements.title: Watershed
elements.description: Watershed helps businesses cut carbon emissions, from the a bunch of guys who were in Stripe

elements.title: CO2 Analytics
elements.description: CO2 Analytics integrates with Xero to provide carbon footprint Measurement & Management Platform for Small and Midsize Businesses

elements.title: Pachama
elements.description: Pachama carbon offsetting by afforestation with satellite imagery, funded by [YC W19](https://blog.ycombinator.com/diego-saez-gil-on-how-pachama-uses-tech-to-help-solve-climate-change/)

elements.title: Nori
elements.description: Nori is a marketplace that wants to create a new way for anyone in the world to pay to remove excess carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

elements.title: Atmosfair
elements.description: Atmosfair a non-profit climate protection organisation with a focus on travel. We actively protect the climate by compensating greenhouse gases through the use of renewable energies, among other activities.

elements.title: Offset earth
elements.description: Offset earth funds for tree planting foundations

elements.title: Choose today
elements.description: Choose today UN-verified CO2-reducing projects in developing countries

elements.title: Climate neutral now
elements.description: Climate neutral now carbon offset platform by United Nations [UNFCCC](https://unfccc.int/)

elements.title: Plan A
elements.description: Plan A has developed a Carbon Reduction Software which helps businesses calculate, monitor and reduce their carbon footprint on a monthly basis.

elements.title: Project Wren
elements.description: Project Wren [backed by YCombinator](https://techcrunch.com/2019/07/07/y-combinator-backed-project-wren-is-aiming-to-make-carbon-offsets-more-consumer-friendly/), app to fund carbon negative projects, also has a carbon emission calculator
